response.original_title: Rabbit Ears: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow
response.overview: Washington Irving's eerie tale of romantic rivalry along the Hudson pits the new schoolmaster, Ichabod Crane, against the local hero and bully, Brom Bones, for the hand of Katrina Van Tassel. This haunting drama climaxes with the appearance of one of the great, legendary ghosts of all time; the Headless Horseman. This spirited adaptation reflects all the wit, fun, and drama of the early American classic.
response.title: Rabbit Ears: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow
